question_text: What does it mean if a RAID array is marked as 'degraded'?
answer_options: It is completely offline and inaccessible
It has lost its filesystem structure
One or more drives have failed, but the array is still running
The RAID controller is physically damaged
correct_answer: One or more drives have failed, but the array is still running
explanation: A degraded array means it has lost redundancy but remains operational until another failure occurs.
